amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Recurrent authorization to operate; renewal or request to operate on continuing basis.
amendatorysection.para: At least ninety days prior to the expiration of its recurrent authorization to operate, a postsecondary institution shall complete and file with the commission an application form for renewal of its recurrent authorization to operate or a request for an authorization to operate on a continuing basis. Financial stability information shall accompany the application.
